pr_title: feat: Render DAG and Rendering Modules Architecture

timeline.message: RenderGraph.java update concurency problems in reconnectAllConnectedInputsTo() - create a local copy of the connectedConnections, using other more common ways of avoiding concurency (iterator.remove) would require much more work and add missing imports
replace legacy AbstractNode with GSOC version. In other words, NewAbstractNode renamed to AbstractNode, legacy AbstractNode deleted
moved AbstractNode from dag.gsoc package to dag
replace legacy Node with NewNode and rename to Node again
Move ModuleRendering to dag package
move dummy node concept class to nodes package
rename gsoc package to dependencyConnections
RenderGraph.java overload reconnectInputFboToOutput() to enable Nodes as both arguments-this is required for module to find nodes by Aka
RenderGraph.java checkstyle
DependencyConnection.java checkstyle
BufferPair - javadoc and checkstyle
RenderingModuleSettingScreen.java checkstyle, ++ initSlider null check, --moduleList dropdown getText unused argument to String.format()
renderingModuleRegistry fix getModuleRenderingByModuleId() cycle which would cause nullpointer exception
RenderGraph.java javadoc for reconnectInputToOutput
RenderTaskListGenratorTest - change DummyNode's method parameter type from javafx.pair to BufferPair
ExternalApiWhitelist - remove javafx.util, BufferPair - patch class to act as a pair. There is no need for any utils.

Merge branch 'develop' into PR-RenderDAG

Update PR branch so as to be able to test it. Not yet tested.

Allow modules access to more library packages.

Enable lwjgl.util and jopenvr in modules, as they're needed by
BasicRendering.

Fix test error

Remove the duplicate Test import in RenderTaskListGeneratorTest.

Deal with skaldarnar's review comments

Remove nio from the API whitelist (it isn't particularly dangerous
but wasn't necessary anyway). Tidy up a few bits of unused code.
Remove inaccurate Javadoc for o.t.engine.module.rendering.

Fix LGTM warning

Remove null check in RenderGraph that just throws an unchecked
exception anyway.
Abort load and show an error when there's no active rendering module.

Remove unused dummy node.

I don't know what it was for in the first place, but it wasn't
actually being used anyway, and removing it doesn't seem to break
anything.

Merge RenderingModuleManager and RenderingModuleRegistry

The manager was an apparently pointless trivial wrapper around the
registry, so I replaced references to it with references directly
to the registry.

Small tidy-up

Remove unnecessary code in RenderingModuleRegistry. Fix some
whitespace and things.
Update onto `develop` (#3990)
Update onto `develop` (#3990)
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/develop' into topic/render-dag

timeline.bodyText:
What's this apiElements line about?
Should we change the above implementation line to an api instead?
timeline.author: keturn

replies.bodyText:
Next PR(also rename error message about BasicRendering)
Returning to small PRs.
replies.author: DarkWeird

Added parentNode and connectedNode attributed to connections.Read below
The idea is that when creating a connection,
  one stores the parent node's uri for easy querying later.
Then when connecting a connection to another, you can store a uri
for a node on the other end. This is particularly needed for
output connections, because you need to check and possibly reconnect these if
you tamper with the dag. This is not yet implemented, but must be used
at least for Rendering API for modules.
